welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Chester, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and smallest terminal at Philadelphia International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a brief registration process.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all commercial flights and provides amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive lounges and services for a more luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
